# setNeedsUpdateOfSupportedInterfaceOrientations()

**Instance Method**

Notifies the view controller about a change in supported interface orientations or preferred interface orientation for presentation.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func setNeedsUpdateOfSupportedInterfaceOrientations()
```

## Discussion

By default, this method animates any changes to orientation. To perform a nonanimated update, call this method from [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/performWithoutAnimation(_:)].

## Configuring the view rotation settings

- **supportedInterfaceOrientations**: The interface orientations that the view controller supports.
- **preferredInterfaceOrientationForPresentation**: The interface orientation to use when presenting the view controller.
- **prefersInterfaceOrientationLocked**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the view controller prefers to lock the scene’s interface orientation when the scene is visible.
- **setNeedsUpdateOfPrefersInterfaceOrientationLocked()**: Indicates that the view controller changed the interface orientation lock preference.
- **childForInterfaceOrientationLock**: A child view controller to query for the interface orientation lock preference.
